CustomField.formula: IF (AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"In Clause Approval"))),IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningSendEmailWizard?id="&Id & "&action=Send_To_Other_Party_For_Signatures", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_SendForSignatures", "Send For Signatures"), "_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SendEmail?id="&Id & "&action=Send_To_Other_Party_For_Signatures", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_SendForSignatures", "Send For Signatures"), "_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Send For Signatures
